property.name: hadoop.tmp.dir
property.description: Apache Hadoop uses directory in hadoop_home for temp, so repeating here.

property.name: io.file.buffer.size
property.description: Size of read/write buffer used in SequenceFiles. 131,072 is 128KB as recommended, which is a multiple of the 4KB hardware page size of Intel x86 systems.

property.name: hadoop.security.authentication
property.description: Either simple or kerberos. With simple, the identity of a client process is determined by the host operating system. On Unix-like systems, the user name is the equivalent of `whoami`.

property.name: net.topology.script.number.args
property.description: Rack awareness script value. Default value 100

property.name: hadoop.proxyuser.httpfsadmin.hosts
property.description: The user, httpfsadmin here, must be the account that starts the httpfs service. The value/s are comma separated hosts allowed to use httpfs.

property.name: hadoop.proxyuser.httpfsadmin.groups
property.description: Comma separated groups to which users impersonated by superuser belong. * means wildcard.
